About Walter

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

I'm a former teacher turned web developer and software engineer. I love all things tech, science (I'm saving to buy a ticket on Musk's first commerical flight to Mars) but, most of all, I love my wife and two adorable kids (they code too).
